1.name: 'Debugging the legacy program'
1.description: 'The aim is to find bugs in the legacy program and fix them, but keep the original structure of the content. The user should write his/her own tests to find the bugs and fix them'

1.name: 'Adding new features to the legacy program'
1.description: 'The aim is to add some features to the legacy content'

1.name: 'Refactoring lesson'
1.description: 'The aim is to refactor the content of the legacy program so the program remains functional. Every exercise corresponds to a step of refactoring'
